title: Bad in Boots (Crossroads Book 1)
features: He blew it with her once. He’s not about to let
Cort Bellamy never wanted to go back to his hometown. That place held
too many bad memories. But his father needed help on the family ranch, and staying away was impossible. He was ready for the hard work. But nothing could’ve prepared him for seeing
again—or for just how far he’d be willing to go to win her back …Joss Ellis has no interest in returning to small town life, either. But her big city dreams fell apart in a

way, and she’s out of options. Seeing her sexy-as-hell ex all over town is just icing on the cake. She can’t let herself fall for him. Her life is disastrous enough as it is. The last thing she needs is for him to break her heart. Again.Second chances don’t come easy—and they don’t come cheap. Is the cost of happily ever after more than Cort and Joss are willing to pay?
Fans of second chances, boots, hats and steamy encounters are in for a treat with the steamy, small town CROSSROADS series! 1-click now!
description: ! The plot was beautifully done. Thescenes were played out like a movie. I could almost picture being thereand feeling with the characters."-Amazon Reviewer"Em Petrova can really write about
! This is a great story, with humor, emotions, love, and intenseheat... Once I started it, I did not want to put it down."-Amazon Reviewer
IF YOU'RE A FAN OF THE DALTON BOYS...and don't mind some
, then the CROSSROADS SERIES is perfect for you. This series has all the hardworking cowboys you love, and they know how to work hard between the sheets too!
